home.presentation_name: Hi ðŸ‘‹! My name is Benjamin Bouillot, a french web developer at Grenoble, France.
home.presentation_other: Here there are my different professional experiences, and some personal projects.

home.presentation_cv: You can download my resume (french version only):

enalean_1021_present.title: Web Developer Engineer
enalean_1021_present.content_1: I'm a front and back developer. I integrate models on front of Tuleap (with Vue.Js + TypeScript), I maintain and upgrade the REST API (PHP). I create some tests too, like unit tests, integration tests, end-to-end tests and validation tests.
enalean_1021_present.content_2: During this period, I work on an integration of GitLab in Tuleap. This integrations allorw to reference a Tuleap's artifact/issue in GitLab commit or GitLab Merge Request.
enalean_1021_present.content_2_link_begin: You can see this integration on this video {0}.
enalean_1021_present.content_3: Languages: PHP, Vue.Js, TypeScript/JavaScript, PHPUnit, Jest, Mock, Cypress
enalean_1021_present.content_4: Tools: NPM, Docker, Gerrit, Jenkins, Nix, Webpack
